snippet.title: Poorzzle - Puzzle Alive Announce Trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegame #puzzlegame #steamgame #gametrailer 

Welcome to Poorzzle, a pure speculative puzzle game. Here, simple lines outline the ultimate purity, and 12 crafted puzzles will subvert your way of thinking.

Here, you will become a savior, unlocking the seal of the Prophet's fragment, in order to obtain the key to immortality. In-depth analysis of the logic and secrets behind the puzzle. Try, make mistakes, try again, every challenge and failure is the only way to the truth. However, reality seems to be hinting to you: this is a scam...
